meanings.sent1: She was repositing her jewelry in the box to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: After using the tools, he made sure to reposit them in the toolbox.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was repositing its acorns in the tree hollow, like a tiny treasure hoarder.
meanings.sent4: He repositing his memories in a mental vault, locking them away from the world.
meanings.sent5: The librarian was repositing the ancient book with utmost care, treating it like a fragile treasure.

meanings.definition: The act of storing something in a particular place
meanings.sent1: The repositing of the documents in the filing cabinet was meticulous.
meanings.sent2: The repositing of the groceries in the pantry made it easier to find them later.
meanings.sent3: The repositing of the toys in the toy chest turned into a game of Tetris.
meanings.sent4: The repositing of the stars in the night sky seemed like a celestial puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The repositing of the keys on the hook by the door became a daily routine for him.
